title: Abiky
author: Abiky
content: I'm looking for a Bitcoin Copper Round with "The Guardian" design made by Anonymous Mint.If you have one for sale, please contact me via PM. I will take the best offer. Shipping would be to the United States. Thanks.

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: There use to be a few sets listed on ebay. I was able to grab a set there.

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: Here's a link to a silk road 3 coin set. https://www.ebay.com/itm/164770113365?mkcid=16&mkevt=1&mkrid=711-127632-2357-0&ssspo=mXUP4WbWSda&sssrc=2349624&ssuid=pkI5WZjRSt6&var=&widget_ver=artemis&media=COPY

comments.author: Abiky
comments.body: Quote from: Suzuki Matt on December 04, 2022, 05:54:14 PMHere's a link to a silk road 3 coin set. https://www.ebay.com/itm/164770113365?mkcid=16&mkevt=1&mkrid=711-127632-2357-0&ssspo=mXUP4WbWSda&sssrc=2349624&ssuid=pkI5WZjRSt6&var=&widget_ver=artemis&media=COPYThanks but I was hoping to buying the coin with BTC instead of Fiat (I'd also avoid save money in fees and whatnot). Besides, I already have the other two coins in my collection. I only need "The Guardian" coin in copper to complete my set. If you know of anyone who has one for sale, please let me know.

comments.author: Suzuki Matt
comments.body: Quote from: Abiky on December 04, 2022, 06:16:45 PMQuote from: Suzuki Matt on December 04, 2022, 05:54:14 PMHere's a link to a silk road 3 coin set. https://www.ebay.com/itm/164770113365?mkcid=16&mkevt=1&mkrid=711-127632-2357-0&ssspo=mXUP4WbWSda&sssrc=2349624&ssuid=pkI5WZjRSt6&var=&widget_ver=artemis&media=COPYThanks but I was hoping to buying the coin with BTC instead of Fiat (I'd also avoid save money in fees and whatnot). Besides, I already have the other two coins in my collection. I only need "The Guardian" coin in copper to complete my set. If you know of anyone who has one for sale, please let me know. Gotcha. I will keep a eye out.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Thought i had one.. went through a 100 copper coins, and not one in sight. Every single other one though. Even guardian in silver and antique silver...  but i did find one for you on ebay.. but only one... are you in states?  https://www.ebay.com/itm/115039657362

comments.author: Abiky
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on December 04, 2022, 09:57:47 PMThought i had one.. went through a 100 copper coins, and not one in sight. Every single other one though. Even guardian in silver and antique silver...  but i did find one for you on ebay.. but only one... are you in states?  https://www.ebay.com/itm/115039657362Yes. But I'd prefer to pay in Bitcoin just to save money in fees (if you know what I mean). A forum member made me a interesting proposition via PM lately. I've already sent him a reply waiting for an answer in return. If the deal goes through, then I will lock this thread. Thanks for the suggestion, btw. It's much appreciated.
